<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// There are 4 scenarios we can use the InlineAdvisor:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Default - use manual heuristics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Release mode, the expected mode for production, day to day deployments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In this mode, when building the compiler, we also compile a pre-trained ML</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// model to native code, and link it as a static library. This mode has low</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// overhead and no additional dependencies for the compiler runtime.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Development mode, for training new models.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In this mode, we trade off runtime performance for flexibility. This mode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// requires the TFLite library, and evaluates models dynamically. This mode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// also permits generating training logs, for offline training.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Interface for deciding whether to inline a call site or not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor/#aec021d6b460b139f3c1d570a0f2dd4b6">InlineAdvisor</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor/#aec021d6b460b139f3c1d570a0f2dd4b6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor/#aec021d6b460b139f3c1d570a0f2dd4b6">InlineAdvisor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor/#aec021d6b460b139f3c1d570a0f2dd4b6">InlineAdvisor</a> &amp;&amp;) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor/#a3543a4a2c8269e927fade2133305fdd8">~InlineAdvisor</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get an InlineAdvice containing a recommendation on whether to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// inline or not. \\p CB is assumed to be a direct call. \\p FAM is assumed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// be up-to-date wrt previous inlining decisions. \\p MandatoryOnly indicates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// only mandatory (always-inline) call sites should be recommended - this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// allows the InlineAdvisor track such inlininings.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - An InlineAdvice with the inlining recommendation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// - Null when no recommendation is made (https://reviews.llvm.org/D110658).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// TODO: Consider removing the Null return scenario by incorporating the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// SampleProfile inliner into an InlineAdvisor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;InlineAdvice&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor/#af70fa833673e4ac07c323a4a94e7ba93">getAdvice</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MandatoryOnly = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This must be called when the Inliner pass is entered, to allow the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// InlineAdvisor update internal state, as result of function passes run</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// between Inliner pass runs (for the same module).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor/#ab2cc3a8b2ee3d65fd980f63923fa2880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor/#ab2cc3a8b2ee3d65fd980f63923fa2880">onPassEntry</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazycallgraph/scc">LazyCallGraph::SCC</a> &#42;SCC = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This must be called when the Inliner pass is exited, as function passes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// may be run subsequently. This allows an implementation of InlineAdvisor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to prepare for a partial update, based on the optional SCC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor/#adb8650aeef845449ba752a76a4237559"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor/#adb8650aeef845449ba752a76a4237559">onPassExit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazycallgraph/scc">LazyCallGraph::SCC</a> &#42;SCC = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Used for dynamically registering InlineAdvisors as plugins</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An advisor plugin adds a new advisor at runtime by registering an instance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of PluginInlineAdvisorAnalysis in the current ModuleAnalysisManager.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For example, the following code dynamically registers a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// DefaultInlineAdvisor:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// namespace &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// InlineAdvisor &#42;defaultAdvisorFactory(Module &amp;M,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                                      FunctionAnalysisManager &amp;FAM,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                                      InlineParams Params,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                                      InlineContext IC) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   return new DefaultInlineAdvisor(M, FAM, Params, IC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125; // namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// extern &quot;C&quot; LLVM&#95;ATTRIBUTE&#95;WEAK ::llvm::PassPluginLibraryInfo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// llvmGetPassPluginInfo() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   return &#123;LLVM&#95;PLUGIN&#95;API&#95;VERSION, &quot;DynamicDefaultAdvisor&quot;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///           LLVM&#95;VERSION&#95;STRING,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///           &#91;&#93;(PassBuilder &amp;PB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///             PB.registerAnalysisRegistrationCallback(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                 &#91;&#93;(ModuleAnalysisManager &amp;MAM) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                   PluginInlineAdvisorAnalysis PA(defaultAdvisorFactory);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                   MAM.registerPass(&#91;&amp;&#93; &#123; return PA; &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                 &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///           &#125;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A plugin must implement an AdvisorFactory and register it with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// PluginInlineAdvisorAnlysis to the provided ModuleAnalysisManager.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If such a plugin has been registered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// InlineAdvisorAnalysis::Result::tryCreate will return the dynamically loaded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// advisor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/plugininlineadvisoranalysis"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/plugininlineadvisoranalysis/#a7c259a023b8d44574a5726f7ff1f760d">PluginInlineAdvisorAnalysis</a></span></CodeLine>
